items.title: The Independent Press Top 40 Bestselling Books
items.description: A new list of the bestselling fiction and nonfiction from independent presses, a coveted notebook lines up with literary trends, and more.

items.title: Be Queer, Do Sports: 10 LGBTQ+ YA Sports Books To Read ASAP
items.description: Whether you're obsessed with Heated Rivalry or are eager for the winter Olympics (or both!), check out these great LGBTQ+ YA sports books.

items.title: What’s Up With All These New Jane Austen Retellings?
items.description: Is it just me, or have there been a lot of new Jane Austen retellings of late? I mean, Austen ...

items.title: Linked Stories About Connection at the End of the World
items.description: If you've never read linked short stories or think you won't like them, give this book about our impact and connection in dark times a try.

items.title: “Pizza Parties Don’t Fix Burnout”: The State of Librarian Mental Health
items.description: Library workers are feeling increased pressures to be everything to everyone, and the impact on their mental health matters.
